contents.contents: Now turn your back on the Collegiate church and take the “Rue Pierre Ythier” on your right, then the “Rue du Palis” on your left. Walk on for a few metres. On your left is the Museum of Provins and its region.
In the basement of the museum there is a room with a display of artefacts dating back to prehistoric times.

choices: It dates back to the 13th century
Because it is housed in the Romane House
It is one of the oldest houses in Provins
It was renovated after being burnt down

explanations.contents: It was set up inside the Romane House, one of the oldest houses in the town ( 12th century). It houses collections dating back from Antiquity to the 19th century. It is about the history of Provins and its surroundings.
